settings.content: This theme is fully supported by Shopify. For support and customizations, contact [teathemes.net@gmail.com](mailto:teathemes.net@gmail.com?subject=[Basel]+Theme+Support).

If you have any problem with our theme (installation, import sample data, configuration...), please don't leave a bad review. Firstly, you can go to our [forum at address](https://teathemes.net/forums/) or you can send us a email to [teathemes.net@gmail.com](mailto:teathemes.net@gmail.com?subject=[Basel]+Theme+Support), we will try to answer you soonest (about 15 minutes in working time and less than 10 hours outside working time). If you fell our support is fast or helpful, hope you can leave us a good review at ThemeForest. Thanks for bought our theme.

settings.label: Google API key (required)

settings.label: Enable catalog mode
settings.info: You can hide all 'Add to cart' buttons, cart widget, cart pages. This will allow you to showcase your products as an online catalog without ability to make a purchase.

settings.content: You can easily add the desired category of products to this theme by installing our free [Nitro Wishlist](https://wishlist.teathemes.net/signup) app.
You can easily add product reviews to this theme by first installing Shopify's free [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app.

settings.content: Metafields allow you to attach metadata, which is additional information, to a store's resources.
Metafields product countdown, Countdown to the end sale date will be shown. Be sure you have set final date of the product sale price. product.metafields.meta.countdown ( 2017/08/17 )
Metafields Use Auto Loop countdown. Product.metafields: meta.loop_countdown : true
=== Metafields Vimeo or YouTube video url. For example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1zPYW6Ipgok: meta.video
=== Metafields Insert tag that will be used to display images from instagram from your customers. For example: #nike_rush_run: meta.hashtag
=== Metafields Insert username that will be used to display images from instagram from your customers. For example: asos_oliver : meta.username
=== Metafields specify different background for particular products while editing it. Ex: name_img.jpg : meta.background_image
To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).
